alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Independence; Jackson; Southeast Van Buren County; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 9:14PM CST until January 31 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...A mix of freezing rain, sleet, and snow is expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations up to a few tenths of an inch are possible. * WHERE...North Central and Central Arkansas. * WHEN...From 12 PM Monday to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow...sleet...or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions. For more information from the National Weather Service visit http://weather.gov/lzk
